titles: A proclamation, imposing a further custom upon wines and tobacco, &c.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the sixth day of October, one thousand six hundred and eighty one, and of Our Reign, the thretty three year.
Signed: Pat. Menzeis, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Tariff on tobacco --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
